page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: The study area is situated in a very rural landscape in an area known as the Golden Valley. The main occupation in the area is agriculture, although more people are moving into the area to live. The settlements of Michaelchurch and Turnastone are very dispersed and new housing is not common. Old housing sells at a premium attracting commuters into the area. The area has no major historical,industrial or social significance. However, it is an area of this country that many people who have experienced its beauty find difficult to leave.
